- David Ibiyeomie Holy Spirit A successful Christian life is a function of the consciousness of the Holy Spirit in you. Consciousness - David Ibiyeomie

Our value for our redemption is expressed through our involvement in soul winning. There is nothing you will do for God that can move God like soul winning.

Soul Winning
Live Service
Give

Helpline

Welcome to Salvation Ministries
(Home of Success)

Salvation Ministries (Home of Success) was established 13th April 1997 with a divine mandate to "Establish the Kingdom of God here on Earth." Her global headquarters is currently at Plot 17 Birabi Street, G.R.A Phase I, Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria; With fast growing branches all over the world.

Knowledge Center

Knowledge Center is the book store of Salvation Ministries were you can get the commissions Books, CDs, DVDs and other anointed materials.

Word of Life Bible Institute (WOLBI)

The Word Of Life Bible Institute popularly called WOLBI is one of the educational arms of Salvation Ministries, Home of Success.

Leading Lights

Leading Lights is the Children’s Ministry of Salvation Ministries that nurtures children spiritually and mentally to grow in Christ.

Testimonies

I was having this shaking of legs for the past 7 years,I came to church with pains in the fourth service as David Ibiyeomie was ministering the power of God touch my two legs I received my healing indeed the God of David Ibiyeomie is real.

Victoria Godpower Salvation Ministries Egbeda Town Satellite Church, Emolga Rivers State.

(Supernatural Favour)

I wanted to start my company but did not have sufficient funds to finance its registration. I decided to sow what I had into the life of Pastor David Ibiyeomie and his wife, Peace Ibiyeomie. When I did, not only was I favoured with money enough to register the company, the registration process was quick and seamless, and I was also favoured with a conducive office space. Glory to God!

Anderson Aseimo Salvation Ministries Church, Edepie, Yenagoa, Bayelsa State.

(Divine Healing)

On the 4th of July, 2021, I took a substance that badly affected my health, to the point that I started urinating blood. I was physically weak. During the service on Sunday, the 11th of July, 2021, I partook of the Communion and immediately regained my strength. Later, when I went to the convenience, there was no blood in my urine. I have been made whole. I give God all the praise!

Oyokoniso Rejoice Salvation Ministries Church, Edepie, Yenagoa, Bayelsa State.
